data_table.description: This data table contains the time lapsed between an arbitrary date and Exam 1 date for Social Network file (vr_sntwk_2008_m_0641s), Original, Offspring, NOS, and Generation 3 Cohorts through 2008.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant SHARe ID number

variable.name: LAPSE
variable.description: The number of months between the participant's exam 1 date and an arbitrary date.
